name: Combo Whack!
description:
Who has never played or seen playing Whack-A-Mole in the playroom, the game where you had to smash the heads of moles constantly coming out of their holes? Probably very few.

This is renewed version of the classic Whack-A-Mole game, where Moles lurk quickly, but you have to be faster than them!

The goal is to hit 7 moles in combo and you will earn more time!


This game is suitable for all ages and it comes with 3D graphics, exciting sounds and power-ups for an addictive and fun gameplay. Test your skills and your reflexes and whack as many moles as you can!

Be the best and fastest player in Game Center.
